meanings.definition: The quality or state of being taut.
meanings.sent1: The tautnesses of the rope made it strong and secure.
meanings.sent2: The tautnesses of the fabric showed the skill of the seamstress.
meanings.sent3: The tautnesses of the balloon made it float gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The tautnesses of the drum skin produced a crisp sound when struck.
meanings.sent5: The tautnesses of the spider's web shimmered in the morning dew.

meanings.sent1: The tautnesses of the sail caught the wind perfectly for sailing.
meanings.sent2: The tautnesses of the wire fence kept the animals safely inside.
meanings.sent3: The tautnesses of the trampoline provided endless fun for the children.
meanings.sent4: The tautnesses of the guitar strings created beautiful music when strummed.
meanings.sent5: The tautnesses of the kite's string held it high in the sky.
